de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.statistics

Class EvaluateRetrievalPerformance<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,EvaluateRetrievalPerformance.RetrievalPerformanceResult>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.statistics.EvaluateRetrievalPerformance<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm, DistanceBasedAlgorithm<O>

    public class EvaluateRetrievalPerformance<O>
extends AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm<O,EvaluateRetrievalPerformance.RetrievalPerformanceResult>
    Evaluate a distance functions performance by computing the mean average precision, ROC, and NN classification performance when ranking the objects by distance.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
